"
How to use:

Step 1. Enter your location.
Step 2. (Optional) Enter your price range.
Step 3. Click Search.
Step 4. Click on the address or maker to navigate." "


Troubleshooting:

1. Location not found
 Please re-enter your location." "

2. Service not available
 Check your Internet connect." "

3. Cannot find any restaurant
 Please press 'Search' again. If after 5 times pressing 'Search', and still no result, then the app can not find any restaurant that matches the description." "
(note) App only returns open place right now.


Any problem or question please e-mail: Randombiteapp@gmail.com" "

Thank you for using my app.
Special thanks to Obaro Ogbo and others."
